ygData.subject: Re: Anyone know anything about GuildWars?
ygData.msgSnippet: Once a guild war is declared everyone of the opposite guild becomes PvP+ to you and you to them.  You can attack them at will.  If you kill them you can loot
ygData.messageBody:
Once a guild war is declared everyone of the opposite guild becomes PvP+ to
you and you to them. You can attack them at will. If you kill them you can
loot one item of there body. You gain and loose no xp.

> ----------
> From: Chtuga[SMTP:webmaster@...]
> Reply To: warriors_eq@onelist.com
> Sent: Tuesday, May 25, 1999 10:12 PM
> To: warriors_eq@onelist.com
> Subject: [warriors_eq] Anyone know anything about GuildWars?
>
> From: Chtuga <webmaster@...>
>
> I am looking for what rules that are in controll when there is a Guild
> War.
>
> Anyone has such info regarding this?
>
> Chtuga
